content.rendered:
Directed by K. Selvaraghavan

Written by Yuri Togkces

Cast Suriya (Nandha Gopalan Kumaran). Sai Pallavi (Geetha Kumari). Rakul Preet Singh (Vanathi). Ponvannan (Pichaimuthu). Devaraj (Killivalavan). Nizhalgal Ravi (Ramanan (NGK’s Father)). Ilavarasu (MLA Pandiyan). Thalaivasal Vijay (Ramamoorthy). Bala Singh (Aruna Giri). Uma Pathmanabhan (Viji (NGK’s Mother)). Vela Ramamoorthy (Sahayam). Rajkumar (Raja). Gopi Kannadasan (Minister Kesavamoorthy). Kambam Meena (Selvi). Karthigai Selvan (News Anchor) . Anirudh Krishna (Pandit). Muthazhagan (Surya’s Friend)

Languages Tamil

Producers Aravendraj Bhaskaran. S.R. Prabhu. S.R. Prakashbabu

Production Dream Warrior Picture
